title: Sans Serif Text Type
content:
I need to use this font for a rush project. Looks similar to Frutiger but it's not. Please help!

Font: 

 Answers: Franklin Gothic Heavy and Question: Textbook New 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317193917/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")

author: selichan

comments.content: The answers look like Franklin Gothic Heavy to me, the question I'm still working on.....

The question:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/textbook-new/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317193917/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/textbook-new/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/textbook-new/")

I'm sticking with Franklin Gothic Heavy for the responses.
